name: Destroying bad guyz (with a drone)
description:
drop explosives on some bad guyz...
(only about 5 minutes worth of gameplay)

Just testing a concept out, this is a little side-project i was messing around with over a few afternoons.

Made using cheap or free assets and stitching together other templates.

pretty much everything is still default placeholder stuff. i just wanted to mess around with an idea, but now i have moved onto a different distraction so i probably wont continue working on this project.

Probably wont continue working on this anymore, but i figured i would share how far i got with it... unless there is enough interest or i find a boost of motivation for this project, this will probably remain dormant.

Free to download and play.  Donations are not encouraged, but if there are any, i will eventually forward it to an appropriate fund to support Ukraine.

feedback/suggestions welcome.
